mapper.select: select lw.id, lw.member_id, lw.experience_program_id, lw.created_datetime, ep.experience_program_title, ep.experience_program_deadline, ep.experience_program_status, ep.corp_id from tbl_latest_watch_posting lw join tbl_experience_program ep on lw.experience_program_id = ep.id where lw.member_id = #{memberId} order by lw.created_datetime desc
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_latest_watch_posting (member_id, experience_program_id) values (#{memberId}, #{experienceProgramId}) on duplicate key update created_datetime = current_timestamp
